page.title: 13Religion in Aboyne
page.content: {Religion:} Three{churches}are situated in Aboyne. St Thomas's church is situated on the A93 and caters for Episcopalians. There used to be a resident{minister} at St Thomas's but at present Aboyne and Ballater have the same minister. The service is on Sunday at 11.15 am. St Margaret's is catholic Church in Aboyne. There is a retired priest staying at the church in Aboyne, but at present Banchory and Aboyne have the same priest. Sunday Mass is at 9.30 am. The{Parish}church of St Machars (Church of Scotland) had their own minister until last year when he retired, now one minister serves the parishes of Logie Coldstone, Dinnet and Aboyne. The service time is at 10 am on Sundays. The Church of Scotland is the one which most people in Aboyne attend.
